item.title: WATCH: Meerkats and monkeys enjoy 'autumn treasure hunt'
item.description: Monkeys and meerkats dug through leaves during an “autumn treasure hunt” at Melbourne Zoo, searching for their favorite treats.

item.title: Trump, Canada's Carney to hold high-stakes meeting amid tariff war, takeover threat
item.description: President Trump and Prime Minister Mark Carney will meet at the White House amid tensions between the U.S. and Canada over trade and other issues.

item.title: Israel attacks Yemen airport after Houthi missile strike near Tel Aviv airport
item.description: "We call upon you to evacuate the airport area," the IDF said.
